subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kyle Okposo had a hat trick as the Islanders spoiled the New York City debut of McDavid, Edmonton’s dazzling rookie, with an 8-1 rout.
snippet: Kyle Okposo had a hat trick as the Islanders spoiled the New York City debut of McDavid, Edmonton’s dazzling rookie, with an 8-1 rout.
